noisepp::TurbulenceModule

noisepp::TurbulenceModule Class Reference

#include <NoiseTurbulence.h>

Inheritance diagram for noisepp::TurbulenceModule:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Adds turbulence to the source module by randomly modificating the coordinates.
